Step.Name: RaiseFault.InvalidContentType
Step.Condition: proxy.pathsuffix Not Matches "/_status" and request.header.Content-Type != "application/fhir+json; fhirVersion=3.0" and request.header.Content-Type != "application/fhir+xml; fhirVersion=3.0" and request.header.Content-Type != "application/fhir+json; fhirVersion=4.0" and request.header.Content-Type != "application/fhir+xml; fhirVersion=4.0"

Step.Name: RaiseFault.InvalidAcceptHeader
Step.Condition: proxy.pathsuffix Not Matches "/_status" and request.header.Accept != "application/fhir+json; fhirVersion=4.0" and request.header.Accept != "application/fhir+xml; fhirVersion=4.0" and request.header.Accept != "application/fhir+json; fhirVersion=3.0" and request.header.Accept != "application/fhir+xml; fhirVersion=3.0"
